title: Smart Thermostat Demand Response Optimization
description: During a heatwave, a VPP operator needs to use a fleet of smart thermostats to pre-cool homes before a demand response event.

tasks.description: Identify all enrolled smart thermostats in the target region.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of 10,000 eligible thermostats.

tasks.description: Send a dispatch signal to the thermostats to pre-cool homes by 2 degrees in the hour leading up to the peak demand period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the pre-cooling command.

tasks.description: During the peak period, send a second signal to raise the setpoint by 4 degrees, creating a load reduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the temperature setback command.

tasks.description: Monitor the aggregate load reduction from the thermostat fleet to verify performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the fleet is delivering the expected load shed.
